"Ronaldine":
"This must be fate...
Looking at you, you might have some skills."

"I'd like to recommend you the training program I created...
But you're not ready for it yet."

"Train some more, then come back here.
If you think you're ready..."

"I am Ronaldine, the ARKS Senior Training Instructor...
Like Liu Mei, I am here to support ARKS' operations..."
"I have prepared a training course for you. Think you're ready to face it...?"
"...I should warn you, my course is not easy. Many people give up before ever reaching the end..."
"It is not for the faint of heart..."
"My course is not easy. Many people give up before ever reaching the end..."
"It is not for the faint of heart..."

"見事だ。ここまでやるとは……。
正直、感服した。"

"その才能……、
もしかすると、ガロアに匹敵するかもな。"

"フフ……、楽しませてもらった。
これからも、その腕に磨きをかけてほしい……。"

"私も、更に充実した訓練メニューを考えておくとしよう。
楽しみにしていてくれ。"
